wordpressPost.title: Test Syntax Highlighter
wordpressPost.content:
Let’s Highlight Syntax

Bacon ipsum dolor amet kielbasa spare ribs chicken cow andouille ribeye tongue ham hock bresaola fatback picanha rump strip steak leberkas meatloaf. Pancetta bresaola flank jowl boudin. Tenderloin meatball chuck salami jerky bresaola. Cupim meatloaf pork belly pancetta, buffalo biltong ribeye tail drumstick short loin meatball turducken turkey t-bone ham hock.

Pork pastrami biltong alcatra meatloaf ham pork loin flank tri-tip. Ball tip short loin spare ribs frankfurter pastrami turducken leberkas salami burgdoggen andouille. Chicken cow turducken, sausage prosciutto turkey kevin ball tip ribeye tenderloin. Landjaeger cupim fatback pig biltong pork chop. Corned beef turkey bacon doner meatloaf pork loin. Jowl doner sausage pork belly cow andouille. Pork meatball shank drumstick brisket spare ribs strip steak corned beef burgdoggen short loin tri-tip tenderloin buffalo frankfurter.

 

 

this.props.postEdges.forEach(postEdge => {
      postList.push({
        path: postEdge.node.slug,
        cover: postEdge.node.cover,
        title: postEdge.node.title,
        date: postEdge.node.acf.date,
        excerpt: postEdge.node.excerpt,
        mainCategory: postEdge.node.categories[0].name,
        project: postEdge.node.acf.project,
        featuredImageUrl:
          postEdge.node.featured_media !== null
            ? postEdge.node.featured_media.source_url
            : '',
        authorName: postEdge.node.author.name,
        authorAvatarUrl: postEdge.node.author.avatar_urls.wordpress_96
      })
    })

Pork belly chuck cow alcatra bresaola ground round. Jowl swine alcatra, flank ribeye pancetta landjaeger pork kielbasa. Burgdoggen pig alcatra sausage t-bone tri-tip turducken salami biltong bresaola kevin hamburger capicola. Burgdoggen chicken swine jerky. Pork loin biltong beef ribs shankle jowl. Burgdoggen filet mignon picanha tenderloin ham flank jowl t-bone ham hock pancetta turkey drumstick. Pig alcatra pastrami, bacon spare ribs shoulder brisket pancetta beef ribs doner swine tongue ribeye chicken ball tip.

 

void main() {
    sayHello();
}

void sayHello() {
    var x = 'bird';
    List animals = ['bird', 'dog', 'lion'];
    if (x.runtimeType == String && animals.contains(x)) {
        print('this is an animal called $x');
    }
}

Frankfurter doner salami, boudin cupim beef meatloaf kielbasa. Brisket turducken ham hock frankfurter flank meatball pastrami sausage. Turkey turducken filet mignon ham, porchetta drumstick short loin pork jerky andouille tongue flank. Hamburger chuck jerky meatloaf, filet mignon pork jowl turkey leberkas meatball spare ribs ball tip beef frankfurter tail. Kielbasa turkey landjaeger, biltong sausage capicola bresaola beef burgdoggen. Prosciutto alcatra beef, drumstick pork belly buffalo landjaeger short loin meatloaf tenderloin ribeye porchetta ham pork chop.
